page.title: 15Daily Menu- 10 Year Old Girl
page.content: {Breakfast:}I choose from bran flakes, rice crispies,corn flakes or ricicles and add sugar and milk. Afterwards I eat hot buttered toast with beans or an egg. I drink fruit juice or hot sweet tea.{Midmorning:}I'm hungry I'll eat anything I can find, apples, or bread and jam.{Midday}is lunchtime: I'll eat chips or potatoes with fish fingers or burger or chicken or roast and vegetables I drink orange or milk. {Afternoon:}I'm hungry again I eat banana sandwiches and pastry and drink tea.{Suppertime:}I eat either lettuce salad with egg, tomato, ham, chicken and salad-cream or chips with sausages or fish or mince. I drink tea with bread, butter and cake. {Bedtime:}I finish the day with an apple and some of daddy's sweets.
